column4: Station one card here. That card is eliminated. Draft a card.
If you clear this section without retreating, draft a card.
Station a card here, then generate a random free agent. If that card has higher POW, wound the stationed card.
When this section is revealed, all of your captured cards are swapped with random cards from your team.
Station an Avenger here.
Station a card here. A clone of that card becomes a mook in every other incomplete section this world (excluding the boss).
Station a card here with 0 or less POW.
Station a member of the Fantastic Four here.
Station a 3-cost card here. Generate a random 3-cost card and add it to your temp.
Set a Squirrel as this enemy's secondary effect.
Station a card here. A clone of that card becomes the enemy for this section as a mook.
Station four cards here. Each time you retreat this section, you may unstation one card here.
Station a card here that does not cost 1, 2, or 3.
Station a card here. Reveal the current boss immediately.
Station a card here. It has a 50% chance of being wounded.
After your first match, if you did not complete the location, station all cards that remained in your deck during the match here (max 4).
Add all eliminated cards to your temp for this section. Cards are eliminated after losing matches here instead of being wounded.
Ego chooses two cards from your team to station here.
Generate 35 free agents and add them to your temp. You can only use those cards in this section.
Station a card here that reduces a card’s cost.
Station a member of Spider-Man’s Rogue’s Gallery here.
Station a card here. If you do not complete this section in a number of matches less than or equal to its cost, that card is eliminated.
Station a card here. After the third match here, if you have not completed this section, station a random card on your team here that isn't in your deck.
Station two cards here. Generate two random cards. If your cards do not have more total POW than the generated cards, your stationed cards are wounded.
Station a card that does not cost 1 here.
Station a 1-cost card here.
Station a card that does not have an ongoing effect here.
Station a card here. If you do not complete this section in a number of matches less than or equal to its POW, that card is eliminated.
Station two on-reveal cards here.
Station a card here. Set a Symbiote as the enemy's secondary effect.
Station a move card here.
Station a card that does not have an on-reveal effect here.
Station a card here. If you complete this section in three matches or fewer, the stationed card returns to your team immediately.
When this section is revealed, wound 3 random cards on your team.
Station a card here. Set 3 random cards from your team as rewards for this section.
The cards you use in the deck that completes this section cannot be used in the following section.
Send one of your cards away to the final world.
After completing this section, launch an attack on a random other section. Deal 3 damage to the enemy there, destroy the location, and wound any cards stationed there.
Station a card here. It returns to your team immediately after completing this section with a wound.
Station a card here. Summon a clone of that card here as a miniboss.
Generate 10 random free agents. They replace 10 random owned cards for this section.
Station a card here. If you clear the section in two matches or fewer, return the card to your team immediately.
This location has the same effect as a random other section in this world.
Station 1-4 cards here. If you do not complete this section in a number of matches equal to the number of stationed cards, all stationed cards are wounded.
Station a card here. Set Monster as this enemy's secondary effect.
Station one of your highest POW cards here.
After each match, station a card here unless you complete the section.
For each card you station here, you may prevent one capture in this world.
After the third match here, eliminate a random card in your deck.
Station a wounded card here.
Station one of your lowest POW cards here.
Station two heroes here.
For each card you station here, you may prevent one wound in this world.
Generate a free agent. Add it to your team.
Generate two free agents. Add them to your team.
Station two ongoing cards here.
Station a card here. After the third match here, if you have not completed the section, that card will defect.
Station a 6-cost card here.
Select up to 20 cost worth of free agents (0 cost 1, 7+ cost 6)). You may add those cards to your temp for this world. The enemy here gains 4 bonus HP.
Station two cards here with 2 or less POW.
Send a card on your team away. Generate a free agent and add it to your team.
Station two cards here. After each match you do not complete the section, roll a d6. The first time you roll a 1, wound both stationed cards.
After your first match, station a random card from your deck here.
You may not challenge this section while there are other sections that have not yet been completed.
Set a Raptor as this enemy's secondary effect.
Station a card here that does not have a wound.
Set a Ninja as this enemy's secondary effect.
Station two wounded cards here. Heal those wounds when they return to your team.
Station two cards here. Those cards must have either the same cost or the same power.
When this section is revealed, a random card on your team is sent away.
If you complete this section, retrieve one of your captured cards (your choice).
Station two cards here. After completing this section, those cards will be swapped with random cards on your team.
Station two cards here. After completing this section, non-move cards stationed here are sent away.
Set a Rock as this enemy's secondary effect.
Station a card here. When you lose a match here, you can select one card on your field or hand. That card cannot be wounded that match.
Station a card here that does not cost 4, 5, or 6.
Generate a random free agent. Add it to your temp for this section.
A random card on your team cannot be used in this section.
This location has the effects of all other revealed sections in this world.
Station a card here with less POW than its cost.
Station 4 cards here. Draft a 6-cost card.
Roll a d4. You must station that many cards here.
Station a card here. That card becomes a captain when it returns to your team.
The first time you skip this section, draft a card.
Generate 7 random cards for this section. At the end of the section, choose one to add to your team. The rest defect.
Send a card away.
Station a captain here.
Select up to 5 cost worth of free agents (0 cost 1, 7+ cost 6). You may add those cards to your temp for this world. The enemy here gains 1 bonus HP.
Station two 6-cost cards here.
After your fourth match here, eliminate a random card on your team and clear this section.
Set Vibranium as this enemy's secondary effect.
Station one card here. That card is eliminated. Revive one of your other eliminated cards.
Station two cards here. Wounded cards cannot be eliminated in this section.
Station a captain here. You may either heal a wounded card on your team or retrieve two captured cards.
Station two cards here. If one has less POW than the other, the card with less will receive a wound.
Draft a random vanilla card.
At the start of each deck construction, station a card here. If you do, generate a random free agent and add it to your deck for the next match.
After the second match, this location transforms into a random other location.
When you complete this section, destroy all other sections and eliminate any enemies or cards stationed there (except the boss section).
After each match in this section (unless you complete the section), station a card here from one of your winning locations.
Draft a card. Add it to your temp.
Station a card with 2 cost and 3 POW here. Gain Sentinel for this section if you do not own it.
Station two 3 or 4-cost cards here.
Krakoa chooses a card from your team to station here.
Station a non-human card here.
Station a vanilla card here.
Station one of the Guardians of the Galaxy here.
Station a card here. It is sent away.
Station a card here. It must be added to your deck during this world’s boss fight (ignoring deckbuilding restrictions).
After each match, a random card on your team is stationed here, unless you’ve cleared the section.
Your cards cannot be captured here.
If your first match is unsuccessful, station a card here.
Draft a card.
Station four cards here. Deal 4 damage to the enemy immediately (this effect can defeat the enemy).
Station three 1-cost cards here. Draft a 1-cost card.
After completing this section, wound the last card you played.
When this section is revealed, revive a random eliminated card with a wound. If you have no eliminated cards, a random card on your team defects.
Station a card here. If you retreat during this section, that card is eliminated.
After you complete this section, station a card from your deck here.
Station two cards here. Draft a card.
If you complete this section, eliminate a random free agent.
Set a Djinn as this enemy's secondary effect.
Station two cards here. After you complete this section, those cards defect and are replaced with random free agents.
After your first successful match, station a card here that is on your opponent’s field at the end of the match. If you cannot, no effect.
Each time you lose or retreat, you must station a card here. Each time you win or force a retreat, you may remove a stationed card from this location.
Station two cards here. Generate a random free agent with 10+ POW and add it to your team.

Station two cards here. Then generate two random free agents. Run a mock Marvel Snap combat with your cards vs. the enemy cards. You have priority, and cards are revealed in order of selection. Hands and decks are assumed empty. If you lose the combat, your stationed cards are wounded. If you win, add one of the free agents to your team.
Station a card here. A t the end of this world, a random 6-cost free agent is added to your team, and the stationed card defects.
If you do not own an Infinity Stone, station two cards here.
Station two 3-cost and two 4-cost cards here to draft a card.
Station two cards here. At the end of this section, each card stationed here has a 50% chance of defecting.
Station one Thunderbolt and one hero here.
No Location Effect.
No Location Effect.
After each match here, a random revealed location in this world transforms into another location.
Station two cards here. After the 3rd match here, stationed cards here are sent away.
Heal a wounded card on your team.
Station up to 2 cards here. For each stationed card, generate a card of the same cost (if available).
The enemy’s secondary effect here is either a Rock or Vibranium. (50% chance for each)
You may station two cards here to deal 1 damage to the enemy.
Station a card here. A random card of the same cost from your team will be stationed here.
When this location is first revealed, it must be skipped.
Station a card here that either generates energy or changes a card’s cost.
Station two cards here. At the end of this world, eliminate a random one and return the other to your team. Then, draft a new card.
Station three cards here. All stationed units in a random other location are healed.
After each match, if you did not complete this section, station an On-Reveal card here.
No Location Effect.
